attributes.action: introduce legislation so that Developers / investors or buy to let purchasers can only purchase property above a set limit to allow first time buyers a chance to buy a house at a reasonable price
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more developers are buying up property that has traditionally been the first time buyer's market. The developer or investor has the money to out bid the first time buyer, and as a result the prices are now too high for many first time buyers. I know of one investor who out bid a young couple for a house, and this person has over sixty houses on the rental market.In many countries, investors are only alowed to purchase the mid to high end property allowing the low end market available to local people and first time buyers giving them a chance to get on the property ladder.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions on this issue already
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=first+time+buyer
Please consider signing an existing petition, rather than creating another.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
